column4: hi guy...HELP!Somebody has BROADCOM BCM4318 AIRFORCE ONE 802.11g???
I need help with BROADCOM BCM4318 AIRFORCE ONE 802.11g...please if u have this card contact me...thanks
: I have the same graphics card
I have activated my graphic card with the bcm43xx-fwcutter
I can help you only with the bcm4318, because my laptop is in 32bits
so i used ndiswrapper && win xp 64 bit drivers
can tell me how do you make it work???
: with debian I compiled ndiswrapper module
: it downloads the firmware from a remote location
